name: Hit the dot
description:
As the title indicates, this is a game about hitting the dot. It may sound simple, but the longer you make it the harder it gets! If you miss the dot five times, the game is over.

The game offers three single-player modes and a local two player mode so you can challenge your friends at the party.

So do you think you have what it takes? Download it and show us what you got!

This is 100% free game, so please support me with a simple like on facebook.

One Leo Games
